thread.title: Cleveland will pay $2.25 million to loved ones of man killed by city police in suburban Parma
thread.title_full: Cleveland will pay $2.25 million to loved ones of man killed by city police in suburban Parma

author: Eric Heisig, cleveland.com
title: Cleveland will pay $2.25 million to loved ones of man killed by city police in suburban Parma
text: The city of Cleveland will pay $2.25 million to the loved ones of a man shot and killed in 2011 by a Cleveland police officer in suburban Parma.
